name: Posing Cut: Marionette Puzzle
description:
Let's imagine and cut the rope!

This application is a puzzle game in which you cut a rope to make a pose for a doll.


## Game Contents ##
You can make various poses by cutting ropes.
Try to clear the stage by creating poses that match the theme!
By cutting the rope, you can make poses for running, dancing, watering flowers, grabbing balloons, and so on.
Don't worry if you fail. You can retry and try again right away.


## Rules Explained ##
Trace your finger as if you were cutting a rope, and the rope will cut.
By cutting the rope, the limbs connected to the rope will move.
When several correct ropes are cut, the correct pose is achieved and the stage is cleared.
